text: one blog is on a subdomain and the other in a subdirectory

well I finally <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/design-manager/site-search-frequently-asked-questions#why-is-a-specific-page-not-showing-up-in-my-search-results|found my answer here>
> The search field only searches for pages that are hosted on the same subdomain as the search results page.
Yea you have to pass in your extra domains via those hidden input fields as well
